EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Optimize Agile Testing - April 23 - NA.Email - Invite 1 - NA
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Optimize Agile Testing with Tricentis
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Optimize Agile Testing with Tricentis
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
One of the greatest challenges facing testing organizations is negotiating the transition to Agile testing. Agile promises a much faster time-to-market, but only testing teams that can leverage automation tools throughout the testing cycle can make good on this promise. In this brief webinar, learn how the Tricentis approach can help your testing organization optimize its Agile testing processes, including:
- How test automation can ease the transition to Agile. - How selecting the right test cases can speed complex testing processes. - How customers have successfully implemented Tricentis Tosca Testsuite in their own Agile environments.
The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-optimize-agile-testing-2014-04-23.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-optimize-agile-testing-2014-04-23.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> Wed. April 23, 2014 1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. EDT (New York, Boston, Washington, Miami)
Michael Niessl Sales Support at Tricentis
Joshua Davis Tricentis Marketing
